message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product for $9,500.  I think it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $7,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your offer, however,  $7,500 is significantly below its true value. I could consider $9,000.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider $8,200? I'm willing to meet you halfway.
